thread.title: Adam Levine honored star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame
thread.title_full: Adam Levine honored star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Adam Levine honored star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame
text:
Adam Levine was honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame Friday.
And he brought his adorable new family to help him celebrate.
The 37-year-old Voice host had his model wife Behati Prinsloo, 27, beside him along with their almost five-month-old daughter Dusty Rose.
Adam looked dapper in a black suit and matching black button up shirt.
Career success! Adam Levine, 37, was honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame Friday and he brought his adorable new family to help him celebrate
He paired the all-black ensemble with black buckled shoes.
His gorgeous model wife looked amazing four months after giving birth wearing a stunning black sweetheart-cut jumpsuit and a pink feather shall to keep her warm in the LA breeze.
She opted for strappy stiletto sandals and a trendy choker necklace to finish off the look.
The Voice host was supported by his model wife Behati Prinsloo, along with their almost five-month-old daughter Dusty Rose.
Defining moment! Adam poses next to his star with a happy grin as he's forever immortalized into the sidewalk
Model behavior! His gorgeous model wife was wearing a stunning black sweetheart-cut jumpsuit and a pink feather shall to keep her warm in the LA breeze
The Maroon 5 front man and his wife looked happy and in love as they posed together beside Adam's newly minted star.
But all eyes were on baby Dusty Rose who was sitting calmly in the audience with her mom.
She was adorable in a white woolly hat and black sweater with flowers embellished on it.
Underneath the sweater she was wearing an all-white outfit.
All eyes were on baby Dusty Rose who looked adorable while sitting calmly in the audience with her mom
Happy baby! The little girl smiled sweetly and looked extremely happy in her mom's arms
She looks like a perfect combination of her mom and dad as she took in the busy scene while staying close to her mom.
Adam was also joined by his Voice co-stars Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani who rallied around him in support.
Gwen sat in the audience beside Behati and smiled warmly at the baby girl.
She was also taking tons of selfies while on the scene, posting them to her snapchat account.
Adam was also joined by his Voice co-stars Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani who rallied around him in support
Belle of the ball: Dusty Rose, four months, had all eyes on her while she delighted those around her
The adorable tot was held over her father's star
The couple beamed at each other as Levine held their daughter in his hands
Gwen gave her share of commentary as she posted the pictures, captioning one of Adam with Blake: 'Babes.'
She went a step further with another snap, drawing a red heart around both men.
While in the audience, the Sweet Escape singer took time to pose with the Maroon 5 front man's wife as the two smiled broadly while watching their men.
'Babes': Gwen Stefani was clearly smitten with two of the men in her life
Bro-mance: Blake and Adam have a bromance going on as evidence on The Voice
Happy ladies: Gwen and Behati took selfies in the audience as their men were up on stage
He's happy! The Maroon 5 front man happily posed with his honor alongside his colleagues
Gorgeous pair! The new parents looked happy to be out of the house and celebrating with their new daughter
Behati is clearly one of her husband's biggest fans
And the Maroon 5 heartthrob is one of her biggest fans as well
